channel.title: Philosophy on xkyle.com
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on xkyle.com

item.title: Blogging = Human Salvation
item.description: Now hear me out, I used to be a hater. It seems that the more people blog, the more the internet is loaded up with wasted bandwidth and ad space. The truth is that blogging has a very small marginal cost, and usually blogging occupies time that would not otherwise be spent doing “productive” things. But! What if all of humanity blogged, and then we could aggregate all blogs on the internet.
